title: Smashed Online
description: A global online educational platform for schools and students to learn about underage drinking, featuring interactive lessons, quizzes, and resources for parents and educators.

title: Frontline Aids
description: A UK Based charity dedicated to ending HIV/AIDS through advocacy and community. Work involved rebranding and developing a new website with interactive features and elements to display key content.

title: Tilt
description: A creative digital agency specializing in film/motion, web design and development, and branding. My role involved creating a new website with a focus on showcasing their portfolio and services.

title: Travelbound
description: A brochure website for a travel agency providing trips for schools and educational groups. Features include trip planning tools, destination guides, and booking information.

title: WCV (World Class Vacations)
description: A website for World Class Vacations, offering specialized trips to schools and organizations for dance, cooking, and entertainment experiences at Disney in the USA. Features a custom-built trip booking platform developed with TypeScript to efficiently manage bookings.

title: Sea on Glass
description: A small West Coast artist creating unique pieces of art from washed up sea glass. Multi-media artworks. Created an online platform for e-commerce.

title: Wrong Side of the Road
description: An interactive e-learning platform focused on drink driving awareness. Utilizes Laravel CMS and online video to create immersive, narrative-driven learning experiences for users.

title: Principle Accounting
description: Principle Accounting provides expert accounting and consulting services for businesses and organizations. I was responsible for monthly maintenance of the WordPress site's core and plugin files to ensure security and reliability.

title: LJWG (London Joint Working Group)
description: Website for the London Joint Working Group on Substance Use and Hepatitis C, providing resources, research, and advocacy information.

title: Roffey Park
description: A modern website for Roffey Park Institute, an international leadership and management training organization. Features course listings, booking, and resource libraries.

title: Vodafone â€“ Design is the Difference
description: Collaborated with Tilt to deliver an interactive web experience for Vodafone, highlighting the impact of design in business. The project features engaging animations and storytelling elements.

title: V4 Wood Flooring
description: Developed a modern website for V4 Wood Flooring, showcasing their product range, inspiration galleries, and dealer locator. Focused on performance and user experience.

title: The Groovy Food Company
description: Built a fresh, vibrant website for The Groovy Food Company to promote their range of natural food products. Includes recipes, product information, and stockist finder.

title: CamperKing
description: New branding and website for CamperKing, a leading campervan conversion company. Features vehicle listings, booking forms, and a dealer network map.
